divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way to work at 4:30 am. Standing in front of disneyland I noticed under the cloudcover a bright red pulsateing object. Moving slowy west and then making a horeshoe turn. The object than proceded to "Shoot" straight down a smaller red object. It than, still in full view under the cloud cover went out or just vanished. I was fully awake and aware when this occured. It was clearly not a conventional aircraft. It was fluid or plasma like, the object. I am on the bus filing this report on my way to work only an hour since the sighting. My feeling is being irritated. Sooner or later someone will have awnser for these sightings.
Summary: On my way to work at 4:30 am. Standing in front of disneyland I noticed under the cloudcover a bright red pulsateing object. Moving slowy west and then making a horeshoe turn. The object than proceded to "Shoot" straight down a smaller red object.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around January 16th 2012
